desc: The home of UK honeyfarms. Proud beekeepers with the finest Buckfast honeybees, our own delicious local artisan V&L honey and our brand new all natural and ethical Hive Inspired skincare, beauty and gift range! We provide local honey bees for sale, local honey for sale and pride ourselves on our beekeeping management.

layout.text: Thank you everyone for your on going support for the Ukraine and to Viktor.

Speaking to Viktors friends and family, we have decided that we can't just sit around and watch. We have set up a crowdfunder to help our goal of helping in the relief effort of the humanitarian disaster in the Ukraine. Please see our crowdfunding page to hear Viktors story and see what our goals are. Any help will be greatly appreciated. Thank you.
